    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Part 6 - Tasks - Module 3</string>
            <string language="en">Part 6 - Tasks - Module 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teil 6 - Aufgaben - Modul 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Partie 6 - Charge - Le Module 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Parte 6 - Tarefas - Módulo 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte 6 - Mansioni - Modulo 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρος 6 - στοιχειώδεις εργασίες - ενότητα 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Parte 6 - Tareas - Módulo 3</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here there are two assignments that are supposed to be shown to, and assessed by, a teacher/tutor.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 3 - How are you?</string>
            <string language="en">Here there åre two assignments that åre supposed to be shown to, and assessed by, a teacher / tutor. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 3 - How are you?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">task</string>
            <string language="sv">assignment</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">task</string>
            <string language="en">assignment</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier dort Anweisungen åre zwei denen åre 
gezeigt werden zu und vorbei festgesetzt werden sollen, ein Lehrer/ein
Referent. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - 
Modul 3 - wie geht es Ihnen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici là affectations åre deux aux lesquelles 
åre censées pour être montré, et pour être évalué près, un 
professeur/précepteur. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des
débutants - module 3 - comment allez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui lá atribuições åre dois a que åre 
supostas para ser mostrado, e para ser avaliado perto, um 
professor/tutor. Safir - vida do inglês e de funcionamento para
novatos - módulo 3 - como é você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui là assegnazioni åre due a che åre supposte
per essere indicato e per essere valutato vicino, un 
insegnante/insegnante privato. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per
i principianti - modulo 3 - come siete?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ εκεί εre δύο αναθέσεις εκείνο το εre 
υπέθεσαν να εμφανιστούν, και να αξιολογηθούν κοντά, ένας 
δάσκαλος/ένας δάσκαλος. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά 
ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 3 - πώς είστε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí allí asignaciones åre dos a las cuales 
åre supuestas para ser mostrado, y para ser evaluado cerca, un 
profesor/un profesor particular. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral
para los principiantes - módulo 3 - cómo es usted?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
